title: Spiritspeaking
content:
Spirit Speakers are adept at interacting with beings in the spirit realm, but to do so, they must first enter the trance-like state known as "spiritspeaking." When a Ranger does this, they gain the ability to interact with spirit beings. In this state they can also influence the physical world in ways they could not previously.

When an ability instructs you to spiritspeak, exhaust your role and replace your Common Tests card with the Spirit Speaker Tests card. While you are spiritspeaking:

  • You no longer have access to common tests.
  • You cannot perform any tests that are not printed on, or used to interact with, a spirit.
  • You can perform any of the tests on the Spirit Speaker Tests card (the Influence test can be used on any type of being, not just Spirits).

When you ready your role (either during the refresh phase or due to another effect), you stop spiritspeaking. Replace your Spirit Speaker Tests card with the Common Tests card.

Note: The Descendant of the Guide role does not instruct you to spiritspeak when it is exhausted. Instead, it instructs you to perform a single test from the Spirit Speaker Test card.
